item.title: Ear Piercing Analysis: Average Age and Additional Data
item.description: My daughter, Aubree, laid into me hard today about getting her ears pierced. Aubree, her mother and I had a fairly long conversation about it this afternoon. Which ended with me having to consider it; not think about it but, honestly consider it. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); All decisions I make require some data. I posed a question on Twitter and Facebook asking, â€œLadies: How old were you when you got your ears pierced?
